data.meanings: day, era, time, today, this/that day, age/period of time.
data.sentence: The word يَوْمَ comes from the root ي و م and is associated with the meanings: day, era, time, today, this/that day, age/period of time.

data.meanings: To be hard, become hard, be grievous, grow up, be great. Kabira/Yakburu: To be exceed anyone in age, become stout and tall, grow big, become great, illustrious, become momentous (affair).
data.sentence: The word الْكُبْرَى comes from the root ك ب ر and is associated with the meanings: To be hard, become hard, be grievous, grow up, be great. Kabira/Yakburu: To be exceed anyone in age, become stout and tall, grow big, become great, illustrious, become momentous (affair).

data.meanings: to punish, accuse, develop hate, revenge, persecute, find fault, disapprove, dislike with tongue or punishment.
data.sentence: The word مُنْتَقِمُونَ comes from the root ن ق م and is associated with the meanings: to punish, accuse, develop hate, revenge, persecute, find fault, disapprove, dislike with tongue or punishment.
